website_summaries.verdict: Delivers a stable sound. Good noise-cancelling technology is built into the headphones.
pros: Ear caps fit tightly in the ears, blocking stray noise while keeping the headphones in place
Includes a built-in microphone and volume control
Magnets built into the backs of the ear pads prevent messy tangles
cons: Works with a limited number of Android smartphone brands

customer_reviews.title: Honest seller
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW I've changed my rating after being contacted by the seller. They wanted to know if I was willing to try another headset out since mine was defective. I agreed and they shipped another, pretty quickly too. The seller took the time to make sure I was happy, and I am. It's a pretty good product, I'm actually thinking of getting another now.
customer_reviews.author: StopItRick

customer_reviews.title: The best part is that these earbuds are magnetized in the back so they stick together when not in use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for USB C headphones ever since the smartphone revolution to remove the 3.5mm jack (which I totally hate). This is a pair of sturdy looking USB C earphones that comes with 2 pairs of extra tips. They work right off the bat with my pixel 2 XL!!! The best part is that these earbuds are magnetized in the back so they stick together when not in use!!! The only thing I could wish for is that it comes in a nicer bag instead of a plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: LoveElectronics

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for USB-c to earphone dongles
customer_reviews.text: Used with a Pixel 2xl. Plugged it in and WOW! it worked right away. (People with the Pixel 2 dongles know what I mean). I tried it with some music, a movie and podcasts and it sounds fine. Music had some nice bass. I've tested the mic by recording a voice memo, and it was a little quiet, but it should work in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Pixel 2 Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality especially when listening to music etc. The buds have magnets in them and keep the wires from getting entangled. "Who'd have thunk it?" Have had issues with this set and others when taking phone calls. There is echoing and a delay. I'm inclined to think that it's a phone issue when using any buds since I have the same problem with different earphones. The buds are comfortable and very good at noise reduction. Good price for what appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Martin H JacobyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Theyre ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my Galaxy S8 since i'll likely be upgrading to a phone lacking a 3.5mm port soon. Theyre very good quality, all the levels are very well balanced but they are only about half as loud as my other set of 3.5mm earbuds. The buttons work but arent very easy to locate unless you look at them. The mic really sucks, so I wouldn't count on using it. All in all, theyre decent. Not what I was hoping, but not so bad I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Bond Kellam

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Pixel 2 XL
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my Pixel 2XL and they work fine! No real bells and whistles and the magnetic tips are a bit of a gimmick for when you out them away. These come with additional earbud tips but no carrying case. The cord feels weird...it doesn't feel like a standard earbud wire but rather, almost like a plasticity stiff feeling. Think of these as the apple equivalent that come with iPhones but a step above them and definitely more comfortable, snug feeling in the ears. +Very comfortable for long periods of use +Phone call quality is good (slightly muffles but not too bad) +Plug and play My two cents.
customer_reviews.author: d.l.r.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be free of the dongle
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these so I could have a second pair to use with my Pixel2 phone. That darn dongle is never around when I need it. These units are great. They fit right into the USB C port on the Pixel and completely eliminate the need for the dongle. They have a very low profile, fit comfortably, and have a good base response. This is just the ticket when I want to go all day and not have to worry about charging Bluetooth headphones or keeping track of the precious USB dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Gexbert

customer_reviews.title: Mic is useless
customer_reviews.text: I consistently have problems with the mic on this device. I regularly have people tell me that I am not speaking loud enough or that they can't hear because the microphone doesn't pick up the sound properly. I have to basically hold the mic on my mouth for people to hear me on the phone when using these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Talat

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PAIR
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair in October, and within a week, they were cutting out. My music started pausing randomly (because it read the headphones as disconnected), and then sound went out completely for the right ear. I had them send another, hopefully not defective, pair. They worked for a month before the same problem started happening yesterday. I am returning them for a full refund. Buy a different pair than these. Also, just fyi, I tested the headphones on multiple devices, and I actually got a new phone after getting the new pair. Still had the above issues. It is definitely the headphones quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Belikova

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 1/1/2019: The seller shipped me a new pair of headphones since mine were defective and the new pair works great. I'll update here if anything changes, but for now, I'm happy with the headphones. ORIGINAL REVIEW: I've been using this headphone for just over 3 months. Everything was great until one morning, out of the blue, one of the earbuds stopped producing any sound. No matter what I do, I can now only listen to sound in one ear at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Mic not working?
customer_reviews.text: Hello , I wanted to know if its just my headset, but the mic is not working. You can faintly hear the voice. I purchased these for an online class I am taking but it’s been useless since others cannot hear me. I literally have to hold the mic piece close to my mouth and speak louder? Is this necessary in order to use mic? Do others have to hold mic piece close to use it? I would like to know because if so I would like to return it. I don’t want to necessarily hold the piece all the time. Even if that, the sound quality for mic is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: A joke
customer_reviews.text: I hate this product, I've only used them once. They are awful, if I even do much as slightly touch the headphones where it plugs into the phone my music cuts off and I have to either unplug the headphones and try again or just play the music. The sound quality is a joke and I can't believe that these even have a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: EDIT: Great customer service!! - Doesn't work for small ear canals
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Acessorz customer service has gone above and beyond the call of duty to try to get these to work for me - thank you Acessorz!! Note that the out-of-the-package eartips may still be an issue for those with small ear canals. ~~~~ If the small ear tips would fit my ears, these would be good. But as much as I try to shove them in, they quickly pop back out. There are plenty of other sets out there that work so I know it's not impossible - I'm not unusually teeny.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Hayes

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I received an email and quick resolution from the seller with an updated product. Apparently, the product has been considerably improved. I will rewrite a review after trying the new updated product for a few months, but 5 stars for customer service! This is a very low quality product. It should not be priced over $2. The disposable headphones you get in flights are a higher quality than these. They never sounded that great to start with, but within 2 weeks, they have completely stopped working! Amazon should NOT be selling this product!
customer_reviews.author: HappyBusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well . . .
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, and it works well with my Pixel 2. I purchased them because it seems my Pixel 2 phone doesn't do Bluetooth very well - I can hear fine using a Bluetooth device, but whoever I'm phoning doesn't hear me well. Unfortunately, I've discovered that I hate using buds like these - sticking them in my ear and hoping they won't fall out - its uncomfortable and I can't abide it. Rather have an over-the-ear wired piece, but there's not many of them out there, and what is offered seems to be of low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alyeska NC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing all around
customer_reviews.text: These lasted just over a month of daily use before the left channel went out. I take good care of my earphones and have always consistently gotten a good year or two out of cheap earphones, so to have these break that fast is pretty ridiculous. Sound quality was disappointing at best compared to what you can get at a department store for $15. Now that they broke I certainly won't be getting them again. Best thing I can say is the in-line controls worked fine and weren't bulky, and the magnets inside to snap the earphones together was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great budget usb c earphones
customer_reviews.text: It had been nearly impossible to find good quality budget usb earphones for my pixel 2. Jbl and libratone q are two options but they are extremely expensive. I found these earphones and decided to give it a try. Great product with an extremely reasonable price tag. The noise cancellation is exceptional. The sound quality is great as well. Overall a highly recommended product for those looking for a USB c earphone!
customer_reviews.author: Rohail Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's nearly impossible to find a set of headphones that work with pixel 2 especially blue tooth. Decided to try these out for the hell of it. The sound is great and I love you can just plug it in and it works immediately. No searching for Bluetooth devices on the phone. Only thing that sucks is the fit of the buds. I tried the large, medium, and small heads for the buds and none fit well. Definitely can't use these for working out but I guess they pass for sitting at a desk and listening to music. Will probably end up returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Kalena

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones If They Lasted
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I purchased lasted a few months until the Left earbud stopped working altogether. I tended to use them a lot, including while doing work outside so I assumed it was usage that did it. I picked up a second pair on sale only to have the right earbud and microphone stop working after a few months again. Eventually the left earbud also went on the second pair another month later. The fit was nice, the sound was good, but the cheaper price seems to mean they won't last for a longer time or extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harris

customer_reviews.title: Right ear stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds sounds good and is not bad with noise cancelling. I hate these types of earbuds because it falls out of my ear way too easily and this one is no exception. Even when I use the smallest bud provided it's still just meh. Also it's only been a month and the right ear has already gone dead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: After a little more than one month, the right headphone stopped working with no visible damage. Edit: After my review the company contacted me for a free replacement. Customer service is very good and they want you satisfied. But the replacement headphones after more than two months the headphones have started to create a static sound. I've been very careful with the replacement pair but it doesn't seem to matter. I'm not sure if I've just gotten defective pairs but these are not long lasting from my experience. The reason why it's not one star review is because of the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first but after a few days of normal use the right side is filled with static. I'm not sure if there is a loose connection in the ear bug or if it's in the mic which is also on that side. Highly disappointed I wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in my ear
customer_reviews.text: Idk if it's just me, but they wouldn't stay in my ear. Sound wasn't too great either.
customer_reviews.author: OCNJ Bum

customer_reviews.title: These do NOT work with the Huawei P20 Pro
customer_reviews.text: So, I was looking for an additional pair of USB-C headphones for my P20 Pro. I love the phone and the headphones that came with it, but I don't wanna get into using them full time. We all know that most phone Mfr. provided headphones just don't cut it for the long haul. Make sure, that you're prepped to return these. And that is after a month of waiting for them to arrive. I'm sure they work great on devices they really work on. Unfortunately, that's not gonna happen on my device (or my MBPro or my Samsung Chromebook Plus) with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Trail

customer_reviews.title: Another Microphone with static, unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd supplier of a USB-C headset that I am returning. Audio thru Microphone has static when using with my Pixel 3 XL. The Google USB-C buds work much better, but I dont like their design. I am still looking for an alternative to Google. I just got the OnePlus BE02T earbuds and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wieder

customer_reviews.title: Acessorz Music Earphones - Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these USB Type-C Music Earphones. First I have to say that while the plug is able to go into my MAC; the music does not come out of the headphones - the MAC doesn't recognize the headphones. On the flip side... I used my Iphone and an android - and with both the sound was great! The earbuds fit comfortably and there are extra buds to use if you need a larger or smaller size. Last, the volume piece is so easy to use... it hangs past your chest - so you can quickly adjust the volume. I would purchase again - especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Updating Review- Great costumer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great, service, I had a little problem with the earphones, the first pair sent to me stop working, I wrote to them and they expedited a new pair for me, and they work wonderful. Sound its amazing! Amazing costumer service! Great communication! Great value earphones!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how good these sound. I use these on my Google Pixel 2 XL. All of the call/music/volume buttons work. The only thing is that a double tap to skip to the next song does not work. It just pauses then continues playing the same song. Double tap does work on my other Bluetooth device
customer_reviews.author: plutosknight

customer_reviews.title: 3 Months of Daily use approx 400hrs of actual use.
customer_reviews.text: I used these every week Mon-Fri for about 6hours+ a day Nov - January. On average headphones last for about 1 - 4 Months with the workload that I use them these managed to last 3 months which is very good in my opinion and even after the 3 months I checked with Acessorz about there about the 6month warranty and what do you know I got a new pair within the week of asking about it. I cannot say they give the greatest sound best material but the durability is well worth the money. If you want something with better sound or material go buy a $100 set of Earphones but for this price, you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality great, but be gentle with them.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones worked well for me, and comfort was quite good in the ears. The mike doesn't snag on my shirt collar which I like. Cord is the right length. The connection in the center piece broke and now only one of the headphones works. Not quite as robust as I'd like, though I can't say if it was me being too much of a brute with them or that part of the product wasn't well designed. But I like them enough that I just bought another set and will be a bit more gentle about that part.
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice earphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but I thought I should make one for this product. I bought these earphones as a back up for when my beats x crap out and need to be repaired (happens every month). The sound quality is really good, I was very surprised. The only thing I am worried about is the cable is kinda thin and I am worried about how it will hold up in the future. Other than that, they are as described and good quality earphones, I would definitely pick these up.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great... And really great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really great. Seller is really helpful. I purchased 3 and 2 of them, the mic was not working very well. Seller contacted me and offered to ship out new ones for free. They also mentioned they had their developers make the product better. You really don't see that every day. I would buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy, sounds weak
customer_reviews.text: 17JAN19 - Update! The seller contacted me directly advising me that they have updated their product based off of concerns from current user feedback. They are sending me a free replacement to test. Will update once it arrives. --Original-- The earbuds came and they don't feel very sturdy at all, almost like I have to be delicate with them or they'll break. I plugged them in to hear the sound quality and while they can do bass adequately, the mids and highs are very muddled and can sometimes even buzz. Definitely not worth the money. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Devon T.

customer_reviews.title: High quality built
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this yesterday. The quality of the earphones is amazing! Premium material, has built in mic. Really impressed by the magnets on the earbuds that let it stick together, so it doesn't get tangled easily, never seen this before. I use this to listen to podcasts and songs. Using buttons, you can control volume, and go to next song/podcast. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Redwan Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Ten Months
customer_reviews.text: Bought these back in April of 2019 and they failed before March of 2020. Is that good or bad for cheap earbuds used on a daily basis? I'll leave that up to you to decide. Of course since they seem to be unavailable now it probably doesn't matter, does it?
customer_reviews.author: J. McGaw

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality good, but not ideal for running
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these is really good. They cancel out most noise and there is no cracking or skipping like with cheap earbuds. I realized when I was running the first time with these that I was constantly fiddling with them to make sure they'd stay in my ears. I would recommend these for leisure activities, but not high impact exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Out with the dongle in with the earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Ok I hate how everyone's out with the headphone jack and on to usb c. But I guess that's the way tech goes. As a reference I use audio Technica m50x and I hate how buds feel in my ear. But these fit nice and aren't leaving a pressurized vacuum in my ear. Compared to my m50xs these feel a little bit bass boosted and cleans are great. Mids are ok. For the price I suprised the mic is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Latham

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in a week
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought these because I drive a truck and with the hands free laws I needed something.these ear buds never for well even when I changed out the soft rubber pieces. After one week the right ear wire started going in and out eventually cutting out all together. I know they aren't very expensive but I did expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, great sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I received a faulty unit and had an earbud go out in a little over a month of use, but the seller was genuine and helpful and sent me a new pair! I'm loving these earbuds, great sound and comfortable for extended periods of time. I'm a music junkie so good sound quality and comfort are important to me, and these provide good value.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Ross

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound quality, excellent noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: I have to be careful wearing these when walking because I can't hear my surroundings, like oncoming cars or barking dogs, but I love that it is a usb-c connection for my phone. I hated keeping track of the dongle and these headphones solve that. Thinking of getting another pair in case of damage or loss.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, stopped working after a month; replacement also stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Barely had these a month before they stopped working. Poor quality, very low quality cable used and connectors used. Do not purchase. Edit (2/18/19): customer service contacted me and sent me their new and "improved" version then asked if I would consider rewriting my review. Well, after a month with the "improved" replacement, it also stopped working in the exact same way. Save your money and spend a little extra to buy from a better company.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1347

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dying
customer_reviews.text: One earbud stopped working after very mild use... Only used them every so often at work. Great headphones but didn't last long Edit- they sent me a new ones to replace the damages one under the one year warranty. Excellent customer service. EDIT- second pair they sent me broke within a couple months and one earbud doesn't work and the base that connects to your phone gets SUPER hot... Uh
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable yet Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds because they were one of the cheapest earbuds for sale on amazon. The seller seemed reputable, so whatever, I went ahead and bought them. When they arrived, oh my god these earbuds were amazing, and they supported calling too, which was an issue with my last one. It's amazing; it arrives with multiple earbuds so they custom fit into your ear and that's much more important than you think. Overall, this 5/5 item trumps the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hur

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound, less tangling.
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of Sensors Bluetooth earbuds for my Pixel 2, and they tangled constantly and had no bass. These sound so much better for less money. The earbuds have magnets that help keep them from getting tangled when stored. I appreciate the free shipping, but I would have paid to get them faster as they came from China and took like 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mayle

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The USB-C to aux adapters are annoying, overpriced, and easy to lose....I was looking at the $100+ USB-C ear buds that Google advertises but I really didn't want to spend that much. So, I took a chance on these. I have to say I am VERY impressed. They fit very well, feel nicely constructed, have great sound, and both buds sticking together magnetically is a simple but great feature. For just over $20, these are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Herlihy

customer_reviews.title: Good option for Pixel headphones
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these and they fit nicely in my ears. They aren't uncomfortable. A more secure connection to the phone would be helpful. The cord strangely tangles/twists up all the time, seeming of it's own volition. Hopefully that goes away as they loosen up from more use.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvi

customer_reviews.title: Poor Microphone
customer_reviews.text: I was seeking a pair of ear buds that were better than the ear buds that came with my Pixel 3. Unfortunately, this was not them. The buds comes with three sizes of ear plugs to pick from. Most people should find a size that works for them. The sound is good and very little noise makes it past the tight fitting buds. Unfortunately, the microphone is very poor. The microphone cuts in and out and overall volume is low for listeners on the other side of your conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in ears
customer_reviews.text: It's comical how these things won't stay in my ears. Otherwise, they seem like a good value, FYI. It's like they purposefully made them to slip out of the ear at the slightest tension. 10x more sensitive than any other buds I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Work well, solid build
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how well these are made, they stay in my ears great! Sound is good for the money. Will have to see if they hold up over time, that said I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap low quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing noise canceling about headphones that don't stay in your ears. These are absolutely garbage quality. The wind can blow them out of place. I initially thought I would keep them for conference calls at the very least, but they won't stay in place and the sound quality is not worth the hassle. Returning them today.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I've been looking for affordable type c earbuds for my Pixel 2 XL since I got the phone last year and after trying a bunch of duds, this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Terron

customer_reviews.title: These headphones break quickly
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these headphones, they break fast. I bought two pairs of these headphones. I used them mostly whole commuting, in the morning in bed for an hour, and at the gym. The first pair broke within about 2 months. I thought maybe it was bad luck, and I otherwise liked them, so I bought another pair. 3 months later, the new pair broke. Both broke in about the same way; one of the headphones stopped getting/ making sound. That's literally their job.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana M. Claghorn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are a great quality and sound fantastic! I enjoy how comfortable they are, they don't cause my ears to hurt after using them for awhile like most other headphones do. I originally bought my pair in December, recently the right ear started to go out. I sent them a message and they responded quickly and sent me a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Google Pixel 2
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! Arrived on time. They actually work with my Google Pixel 2. I have had some issues getting USB-C items to work with it, but no issues with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Flossie Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent on Pixel 2 XL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Amazon for $15.99 and it works great with my Pixel 2 XL. it comes with different size ear buds so you can choose which size is best for you. works great., and the wire is THIN which is great. it has magnetic buds which click together to stay together when in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I was super sick of the dongle I was using. I went through four or five of them until finally decided to see if something like this existed. Skeptical at first, but I was pleasantly surprised by how well they worked. The fit snuggly into the port on my phone, they quality is nice, they feel nice in my ears, and they don't cut in and out like a lot of other earbuds I've tried have. They're even magnetic so when I'm at work and I have to take them in and out a lot, it's nice that they stay together and don't tangle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The Pixel 2 doesn't have a lot if options for corded headphones. The pigtail didn't last long with my teenager, so we looked for other options. Bluetooth is great, but how often does your kid remember to charge them? These headphones are the perfect solution. The sound quality is great, and the quality is amazing. We did have a problem with one earbud that quit working but their customer service was awesome and got a replacement pair out quickly. I've just purchased a second pair for my son who is getting his first phone for Christmas. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: zayn malik

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the earplugs, perfect for my Pixel 2. I had an issue and the seller was kind enough to solve it. Buy this you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: mmad

customer_reviews.title: I guess I should have bought the warranty protection plan :/
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these earphones! But after 3 months there is a static cracking sound anytime the wire is moved. They keep randomly pausing and unpausing what I'm listening to or watching, or activate the microphone. The worst thing is it will randomly raise my volume all the way up which is extremely painful and jarring. So I think there is a short in the mic/very buttons. I really did love these earphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth $24. I can see myself breaking these very very quick as I plan on taking them to the gym with me. The sound quality is subpar. I'd rather pay 20$ more and get Bluetooth or something if this is the best I can find on Amazon. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good design, but one side stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad. When I received this set, the left speaker played a high-pitched tone, but it also played my music. After a while, I could ignore the tone, so I didn't send it back. Now, though, it doesn't play anything but the tone. Unfortunately, this change happened outside of the return window. I love them otherwise! The design is attractive while remaining unobtrusive. The smallest cushion fits my ears perfectly, and the sound quality of the working side is great.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for maybe a couple of months and one of the earbuds stopped working--no sound. POS. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mteresa06

customer_reviews.title: Fall out easily
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is ok, but really not great. They do not stay in very well though. I got these so I could get rid of the dongle and control the volume on my phone while on the subway, these fall out so easily I would rather use my old iphone headphones that stay in and manually change the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cawley

customer_reviews.title: USB type C not wireless Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Overall for the price of these they are very good pair of headphones. the sound is awesome with noise cancellation working very well. Buttons are easy to access. If your looking for a good pair of USb type C headphones then I would recommend buying these. Just remember they are not wireless Bluetooth they are type C compatible so make sure they will work with your phone. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M.

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: These have been a pleasant surprise. The sound quality is better than I expected. Shipping time was faster than the estimate.
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: Connector wiggles on Pixel 3
customer_reviews.text: So the first few weeks I owned these it had an occasional issue with pausing seemingly randomly, but it was okay. After that though it started happening more often and sometimes I would get audio only playing out of one speaker. It turned out the connector is not wide enough for the USB-C port on my pixel 3. The result is that it wiggles back and forth quite a bit. It will work as long as the connector is straight, but it's overall just really disappointing. I bought them because the buttons on my OEM Pixel 3 headset had stopped working(probably because I washed them), but I'm back to using the OEM because they don't wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kern

customer_reviews.title: New pair worked well
customer_reviews.text: New: the seller sent me a new pair of the headphones that work in both ears. I left the product at 4 stars due to the inconsistent quality. The seller did make it right by sending me an additional pair that worked well. Old: The earphones are comfortable in my ear, but only the right side has full volume. The left side has 30% of the volume of the right side. I have tried multiple sources (cell phone and computer) and various types of audio (news, music, video).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your cash on trash
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage. First set I bought only lasted for six months of normal use. Second set stopped working after one week. The second set DAC stopped working properly and my phone thought it was a charger plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Primrose

customer_reviews.title: Google Pixel 2 compatible
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, works perfectly with the Google Pixel 2, the magnetic ear pieces help prevent tangling. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphone well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This product works pretty well for my P20 pro. Its sound and microphone is well worth for the price. Besides the costomer servive is fantastic. Due to delivery issue I can not find my product, They immediately deliver me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: JiaD

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review on any product before but these are quite possibly the worst headphones I've ever had. At the time I purchased them I accidentally bought 2 pairs and good thing I did because the first pair only lasted a month. The second pair lasted not too long after that. They begin to have a mimd of their own, pausing music all on their own and changing the volume as well. Eventually one side goes out and you throw them away. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Not Great Quality; Hard to Keep in Ears
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really hard to keep in my ears, they slip out even if I'm just sitting still. It's even worse when I'm on my commute and moving and having to re-adjust them constantly. Also, I'm getting a lot of static already (as if there is a short in the wires) after just a couple of months of use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfec the for the price and sound quality is incredible
customer_reviews.text: Reason for not being a 5 star is the headphones grip in the ears is loose and falls of the ear frequently. its for sure not to be used for physical activity, if not it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earphones for my son, who has a Google Pixel phone. He is very happy with them, they work perfect, and they are stylish too. If the kid is happy, I am happy too!
customer_reviews.author: Mumsy2004

customer_reviews.title: Good for listening not for talking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to listen to music while running. They work great for that. What they don't work well for is phone calls. People report that my voice sounds muffled. When I switch to a different headset, all is fine. So it's clearly this headset. To bad, because they are comfortable and the listening sounds quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sims

customer_reviews.title: Frail wires
customer_reviews.text: Every sound quality aspect is phenomenal with these earbuds. HOWEVER I have had these headphones for not even a full week and the left earbud suddenly stopped working today. I was looking at it for signs of damages and noticed that if the central wire attached to the port is at some absurd curved angle, sound continues to play perfectly through it again but only while the wire is in that position, rendering the left earbud useless.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar-Moon Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Right ear stopped working after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: The right bud stopped working after three months. I would not buy this again. And I can't recommend this to anyone, even at this attractive price point. Note: I'm a Pixel 2XL user.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as headphone but mic is awful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use on calls - everyone I talk to says that they can't hear me - very far away - faint - have to hold mic up to my mouth to be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Robert Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Very clear sound. Options to change out ear bud covers to fit in your ear. One doesn't stay in my ear very well but I'm pretty sure it's me. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: deb c

customer_reviews.title: Really poor microphone
customer_reviews.text: The microphone and location of controls is a poor design. People could hardly hear me talking on this microphone, the audio was decent for a cheap pair but not very comfortable in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to use a connector to use normal headphones and this ear phones was a big relief.. good sound quality and nice to use
customer_reviews.author: Sajindas

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son in January and they died in less than three months. I think they haven't worked in a while but he hadn't bothered to tell me. There is no visible damage. No sound at all in the left ear, and just a very quiet ticking in the right ear.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Do not work
customer_reviews.text: these ear buds do not work. I have tried on my phone and my sons. Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.author: On the ridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sound quality is excellent on my oneplus 6t whether for music play back or phone calls..I would buy this product again..customer support is superb..couldn't be happier with the whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: john clowers

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality, Bad mic
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, and it's comfortable to wear but the microphone is horrible. I have to hold the microphone literally touching my lips to get anything through it, so I just use it to listen to music and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These usb c earphones are better than the ones shipped with my new phone. I love them, and can't complain about the price. The microphone is good, and makes all calls much more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon D. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - Does Not Work for HTC U11
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and they do not work. No icon even saying that the device is registering these as headphones. Needless to say there was zero sound. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: ortem

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite headset
customer_reviews.text: These are great earphones. They are more comfortable than any of my other ear buds and the magnetic link that keeps them untangled is such a great innovation. Sound quality is also excellent. Finally not needing an adaptor for my Pixel is nice. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Was nice, but died in about 2 weeks of ought usage. Now the microphone barely registers sound and the left ear piece doesn't even work. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of forgetting my audio adapter so I figured it wouldn't hurt to try these headphones out. They are perfect! They cancel noise quite well and the music sounds great. The mic isn't the best but I can still be heard well enough to get by.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Shorted Out-Minimal Usage
customer_reviews.text: I used these 3-5 times and the right headphone shorted out. I realize these are cheaper earbuds, but there are not many USB C headphones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: iamcamouflage

customer_reviews.title: Works for pixel XL 2!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my pixel XL 2, controls on earphone works! Will be great if it includes a skip and return function too. But I'm more than satisfied with this, especially given the price. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: josephine t.

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review (#2)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones August 28th 2018 and the left side was out by late September, and the right side went out about a week ago. Update: Customer Service contacted me fast to let me know that they can send a replacement. Update #2: new pair was sent! very satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Khan

customer_reviews.title: Broke the wires pretty fast at the connector
customer_reviews.text: Could benefit from larger wire and/or thicker insulation at the connector
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: These have been very good earphones, nice quality sound. I did have a problem with the right earphone after about three months. They were replaced immediately without any difficulty. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: bbtrucky

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, scared $140
customer_reviews.text: Had the Google brand headphones that cost $149. These seems to work just as good so far. Can't comment on durability because have not had them long.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding and feeling sub 50$ headphone I've used
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pixel 2 and they work perfectly. The headphones sound amazing (especially for a budget pair). The build quality is great, though braided wires would be awesome, I know the price point doesn't acomodate that. I love the magnets in the earpieces and they work better than many more expensive magnetized buds.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great USB-C Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked very well. It is very hard to find headphones that work for my essential. It would be nice if they were braided for protection, but still incredible headphones. Noise cancellation is also very great. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shadd

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is quite good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of ear buds, these are by far the best. Sound quality is very good, the USB type-C plugin is even better! I did have an issue with one side quitting but they are sending a new pair for free. Overall really impressed. I bought a second pair for at work!
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: Updated Version
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated version to these earbuds that I was unaware of. Excellent customer service and information. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Alan Martin

product_meta.title: USB Type C Earphones, Acessorz Wired in-Ear Magnetic Earbuds with Mic, Stereo Bass Noise Cancelling Headphones Gym Sports Headsets Compatible with Google Pixel 3/2/XL, Huawei, Essential Phone - Black
feature_bullets: [Great Sound Quality] -High resolution usb type-c DAC chip that converts standard resolution audio to superior Lossless audio. The light but rigid PVC case keeps sound stable for a richer, more dynamic performance. Especially design for Google Pixel 2/2 XL, works perfect with Google assistant.

[Passive Noise Canceling] - When playing the music no matter in the noisy streets or in the subway and plane, you will not hear these noise, thanks to the sealed silicone In-ear caps. Only the music wrapped in your ear, enjoying wonderful music

[ATTENTION: Compatibility] - It ONLY supports type-c devices mobile phones below: Compatible with iPad pro 2018, Google Pixel 2/2 XL, Google Chromebook, HUAWEI Mate 10/20 Pro/P20. For HTC 10/U11/U12, Essential PH-1, Razer Phone. Other type-c interface devices NOT support.
[Remote and Mic] - Hands-free in-line microphone and remote allows you to answer a call while driving, easily access to music volume control on the go.

[6-Month Warranty] - We warrant this device 6 MONTHS from date of the original purchase for manufacturer defects. If the device fails due to a manufacturing defect, please contact seller directly to initiate return and warranty process.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars283 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
